meanings.definition: To use one's eyes to see something.
meanings.sent1: I lookie at the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She likes to lookie at the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: When I lookie at my messy room, I feel motivated to clean up.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lookie with wonder at the colorful painting.
meanings.sent5: Lookie carefully at the map to find the hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: An act of looking or a glance.
meanings.sent1: He gave a quick lookie at the menu before ordering.
meanings.sent2: She caught a brief lookie of the mysterious figure in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curious lookie at the bird outside made me smile.
meanings.sent4: His intense lookie across the room made her blush.
meanings.sent5: The child's innocent lookie at the puppy melted everyone's hearts.
